Translations.Text: Alo, wigi d issekniyen n Tezmamt tuuwibt
Day d lwehma, i medden, ma Nweeea n i urgaz nnsen: "nabi imdanen, becceo wid iumnen ar ad afen arraz umain ar Mass nnsen"? Nnan ijehliyen: "wagi, s tidep, d aseeear n uuee

Ih, Mass nnwen d Oebbi, i Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan di sdis wussan. Sinna, Iaannec $ef usgeld, Iseyyi lameo. Ur illi umcafaa siwa ma Iaammed as. D wagi ay d Oebbi, Mass nnwen. Ihi, aabdet eP. Day ur d tesmektayem ara
£uoeS akw tu$alin nnwen. Lemaahda n Oebbi d tidep. Ih, Inezzu axlaq, Ippales, iwakken ad Ikafi wid iumnen u xeddmen ayen ilhan, s lmizan. I wid ijehlen, tissit io$an, aaaqeb aqeoean, imi llan jehlen
D Neppa i Irran iiij d lefnao, aggur d tafat. Iwezn as tiswaain, iwakken a ppissinem amvan iseggwasen, akked leesab. Ur Ixliq Oebbi ayagi, siwa s tidep. Ipfeuuil issekniyen i ugdud issnen
S tidep, di lemgarda ger yiv akked wass, akked wayen Ixleq Oebbi di tmurt akked igenwan, ard issekniyen i ugdud i ipeezziben
Ih, wid ur negguni ara timlilit yidne£, i tqennaa tmeddurt di ddunit, u rekden degs, d wid i istehzan $ef issekniyen nne£
Wigi, axxam nnsen di tmes, ilmend n wayen keppben
Ih, wid iumnen u xeddmen ayen ilhan, a ten Inhu Mass nnsen, s liman nnsen. Ad ppazzalen isaffen seddawat sen, di leonanat isaadiyen
Anuju nnsen degs: "gedha s yissek a Oebbi"! Azul nnsen d: "tifrat". Anuju nnsen aneggaru: "ccekoan i Oebbi, Mass imavalen
Lemmer ad Iaaoel Oebbi cceoo ar imdanen, akken nitni earen $ef lxio, yili ibbwev asen lajel nnsen. A Nanef i wid ur negguni ara timlilit yidne£, ad ddebdben di lbe$wv nnsen
Amdan, ma ieuza t ccqa, ad a£ £ d isiwel, ieeel, iqqim ne$ ibedd. Mi s Nekkes ccqa s, ad iteddu amzun ur d inuj $uone£ilmend n ccqa i t ieuzan. Akka ay ppucebeen igiten nnsen i imaafan
Ni$ Nesqucc isuta, uqbel nnwen, imi densen. Ussan d $uosen imazanen nnsen, s ubeggen, ur llin d wid ara iamnen. Akka ay Nepqeiii agdud ibe$wviyen
Sinna, Nerra kwen d igensas di tmurt, deffir sen, a Nwali amek ara txedmem

Ma $oan asen issekniyen nne£ iberrzen, wid ur negguni ara timlilit yidne£, ad inin: "awi d Leqwoan nniven, ne$ beddel it". Ini: "ur felli a t beddle$, s leb$i n yiman iw. Teddu$ kan akked wayen iyi d ippuweeean. Nek ugade$, ma xedaa$ Mass iw, aaaqeb n wass ameqwoaean
Ini: "lemmer i S ihwi i Oebbi, ur awen t id mli$, ur awen t id mmekti$. Ni$ zed$e$ yidwen tameddurt, uqbel is. Day ur tfehmem ara
Anwa i idensen kteo, ger win id igren tikerkas $ef Oebbi, ne$ win inekoen issekniyen iS? Ih, ur rebeen ibe$wviyen

La aabden, war Oebbi, ayen ur ten neiiuou, ur ten nenfaa. La qqaoen: "wigi d imcafaen nne$ ar Oebbi". Ini: "day a pxebboem Oebbi $ef wayen ur Issin, di tmurt akked igenwan"? Gedha s yiS! I Aalay sennig wayen pcaraken
Llan imdanen d yiwen n lois kan. Sinna, mgaraden. Lemmer ur d izwar ara wawal, s$uo Mass ik, ad yili ueuddu, garasen, $ef wayen i$ef mgaraden
La qqaoen: "a lemmer id irs $uoes ussekni n Mass is"! Ini: "tabavnit ar Oebbi kan. Ihi, gganit. Nek, yidwen, seg wid iggunin
Ma Neseess i imdanen aeunu, deffir twa$it i ten ieuzan, atnan la ppandin i issekniyen nne£. Ini: "Oebbi Yif akw akken Ip$awal di tieeoci". Imersulen nne£, s tidep, pparun ayen teppandim

Neppa i kwen Ippawin di lberr, di yill. Alamma, mi tellam di lembwabeo, teppedum degsen s wavu uuwib, feoeen yis, tusa d tbucivant $uosen, ppasent ed lemwao $uosen, si yal tama, eulfan a d tezzi fellasen. Naaoen Oebbi, s lqaaida i Neppa: "ma Tsellkev a$ si tagi, ar a nili seg wid isnemmiren
Mi ten Isellek, imiren u$alen be$wven di tmurt, war ssebba. A yimdanen! Lbe$wv nnwen, siwa $ef yiman nnwen. Zzhu di tmeddurt n ddunit, sinna, $uone£ tu$alin nnwen, ad awen Nmel ayen txeddmem

Amedya n tmeddurt di ddunit, am aman kan. Nesse$li ten id seg igenni, xelven akked im$an n tmurt, iseg teppen imdanen akked lmal. Mi tcebbee tmurt, tu$al d tuzyint, $ilen, imezda$ is, ar deg ufus nnsen ay tella. Iusa p id lameo nne£, deg iv, ne$ deg wass, Nerra p d ahicuo, amzun ur teoouoeg ass izeryen. Akka ay Nfeuuel issekniyen i ugdud ipxemmimen
Inecced Oebbi s axxam n tifrat. Inehhu win i S ihwan, ar ubrid uwqim
I wid iweqmen, lewqama, ternuv as. Udmawen nnsen, ur ten ipnal bufsus, ne$ ddell. Widak, d at Loennet, nitni, degs ad wekkoen
Aqeiii n wid id ibbwin tucmitin, d tucmip itent icban. Ad ndellen. Ur saun ameneul ar Oebbi. Amzun $ummen wudmawen nnsen, s ccevyat n yiv iberkanen. Widak d at tmes, nitni, degs, ad wekkoen
Ass ideg ara ten Nfesser akw, a Nini, imiren, i wid icurken: "imukan nnwen, kunwi akked icriken nnwen"! Sinna Nessemfaoaq iten. A d inin, icriken nnsen: "macci d nekwni ay taabdem
Ad Iqadd Oebbi, d Anagi garane$ yidwen, ar ur d neclia deg uabbed nnwen
Din, yal amdan ad iwali ayen iwasa. Ad u$alen ar Oebbi, Bab nnsen n tidep. Itelf iten wayen d snulfuyen

Ini: "anwa ikwen Ip$itin seg igenni akked tmurt? Anwa ay d Bab n tmejjin akked yieoi? Anwa id Issuffu$en amuddir si lmegget, id Issuffu$en lmegget seg umuddir? Anwa i Iseyyin lameo"? A d inin: "d Oebbi". Ini: "ihi, day ur tepeezzibem ara
D wagi ay d Oebbi, Mass nnwen n tidep. Deffir tidep, acu i illan, siwa ttelfan? Ihi, acimi texdaam
Akka i iuao wawal n Mass ik, $ef wid ixedmen tucmitin. Ih, nitni ur ppamnen
Ini: "day illa ger icriken nnwen, win id inzan lxelq, sinna, iules as d"? Ini: "Oebbi inezzu lxelq, sinna, Ippales as d. Ihi, amek ara twexxoem

Ini: "day illa, ger icriken nnwen, win i inehhun ar tidep"? Ini: "Oebbi Inehhu ar tidep. Win Inehhun ar tidep, day ur Yif ara, akken Iklal tikli yideS, win ur nennehhu, siwa ma ipwanha? Acu ikwen iu$en? Amek tepseyyim
Tegwti, segsen, teddun kan d nnwaya. Nnwaya, war ccekk, ur tebbwi acemma si tidep. Ih, Oebbi Issen acu xeddmen
Leqwoan agi ur d innulfa ara, war Oebbi. Maca, d atebbet n wayen it id izwaren, d afeuuel n Tezmamt, ur degs ccekk, s$uo Mass imavalen
Ne$ la qqaoen: "isnulfa t id". Ini: "awit ed tasuoep i t icban, neccdet seg wanda tzemrem, war Oebbi, ma tessawalem tidep
Xaii, skaddben ayen ur nekcim di tmusni nnsen, ur ten id iusi usefhem is. Akka ay skaddben, wid i ten id izwaren. Wali, ihi, amek tevoa d imednas
Garasen, wid iumnen yis; garasen, wid ur numin yis. Mass ik Yif akw akken Issen ifessaden
Ma skaddben k, ini: "i nek igiten iw, i kunwi igiten nnwen. Ur teppkam deg wayen xedme$, ur ppka$ deg wayen txedmem
Garasen, llan wid i k issemeasen. Day tzemrev a pperrev ad slen iaeeeugen, ma llan ur fehhmen
Garasen, llan wid i k ipmuqulen. Day tzemrev a ppenhuv ider$alen, ma llan ur pwalin
Oebbi, s tidep, ur Iddennis imdanen, s wacemma, maca imdanen densen iman nnsen
Ass ideg ara ten Ifser, amzun saaddan kan saaa n wass, ad msaaqalen. Ni$ xesoen wid iskaddben timlilit d Oebbi. Ur pwanhan
Ad ak Nessken kra seg wayen i sen Naahed, ne$ a k id Nawi $uone£. Ihi, $uone£ tu$alin nnsen. Sinna, Oebbi d Anagi n wayen xeddmen
I yal lois, amazan. Ma iusa d umazan nnsen, a ppefru garasen s lmizan, ur pwadensen
Qqaoen: "melmi lemaahda agi, ma tessawalem tidep
Ini: "ur mlike$ i iman iw vveoo, ne$ aba$uo, siwa ayen Ib$a Oebbi. Yal lois s lajel is". Ma iusa d lajel nnsen, ur t swexxioen s saaa, ur t id sseqoaben
Ini: "acu twalam, ma iusa kwen id uaaqeb iS, deg iv, ne$ deg wass? Acimi earen $uoeS ibe$wviyen
D$a, ma iusa d, a ppamnem yis? Tura, aql akwen t$eubem fellas
Sinna, ad asen inin i wid idensen: "jeoobet aaaqeb n lebda. Ma teppuqeiian siwa kan $ef wayen tkeppbem
Steqsayen k: "d tidep ayagi"? Ini: "ih, s Mass iw, ar ayagi d tidep! Kunwi ur tezmirem i usfunneg
Xas ad isau, yal amdan idensen, i illan di tmurt, ur d ifeddu yis. Ffren nndama mi walan aaaqeb. Aeuddu garasen, s lmizan, ur pwadensen
Day, s tidep, macci n Oebbi i illan di tmurt akked igenwan? Ih, day lemaahda n Oebbi macci d tidep? Maca, tegwti segsen ur ssinen
Neppa Issidir, Ineqq. £uoeS ara tu$alem
A yimdanen! Ni$ iusa kwen id unabi s$uo Mass nnwen, akked ccfa n wayen iblan ulawen, akked nnhaya, akked ueunu i lmumnin
Ini: "s lfevl n Oebbi akked ueunu S, s waya, xas ad feoeen". Yif ayen pkemmimen
Ini: "twalam ayen i wen d Issers Oebbi n ooeeq? Terram segs leelal d leeoam". Ini: "Iaammed awen Oebbi, ne$ tesnulfam d $ef Oebbi
Acu ara meyyzen, ass n tnekra, wid id igren tikerkas $ef Oebbi? Ih, Oebbi d Bab n lfevl af imdanen, maca tegwti segsen ur snemmiren

Ur teppiliv di lieala, ur temmalev si Leqwoan, ur tepce$wilem di kra, mebla ma Nella d Inagan nnwen, mara tweqmem. Lmizan ubelkim di tmurt u deg igenni, ur idrig i Mass ik. Akken seddaw waya, ne$ sennig es. Akw, di Tezmamt ipbegginen
Ih, s tidep, iebiben n Oebbi ur ppagwaden, ur $weblen
Wid iumnen u llan eezzben
a ten beccoen s lxio di tmeddurt n ddunit, di laxeot. Ur illi ubeddel deg wawalen n Oebbi. D wagi ay d rrbee ameqwoaean
Ur k i$webbel wawal nnsen. Ih, tazmert akw n Oebbi. Neppa Isell, d Amusnaw
S tidep, day macci n Oebbi i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt? D acu iiafaoen wid ipnujun, war Oebbi, ar icriken? Iiafaoen kan nnwaya. Oaaalen kan
Neppa, i wen Irran iv i ureyyee nnwen, ass iwakken a pwalim. Deg waya, s tidep, d issekniyen i ugdud isellen
Nnan: "Oebbi Isaa aqcic. Gedha s yiS! Neppa d Ameokanti. IneS i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt. Ur tesaim adabu $ef waya. Day a d tinim $ef Oebbi, ayen ur tessinem
Ini: "s tidep, wid id igren tikerkas $ef Oebbi, ur rebeen
Zzhu di ddunit, sinna, $uone£ tu$alin nnsen. D$a, ad asen Nsaaddi aaaqeb uqsie, imi llan jehlen

Eeku yasen d tadyant n Nue, mi inna i ugdud is: "a yagdud iw! Ma eeayit fellawen tilin iw, akked usmekti w n issekniyen n Oebbi, $ef Oebbi ppekle$, ihi, zduklet lameo nnwen akked icriken nnwen. Sinna, ur awen teppili lhejna $ef lameo nnwen, d$a, frut ep felli, ur iyi sganit
Ma twexxoem, ur awen ssuture$ taqdiat. Ih, taqdiat iw ar Oebbi kan. Felli lameo ad ili$ seg imvuaen
Skaddben t. Nsellek it, akked wid illan yides, di lbabuo. Nerra ten d igensas. Ne$meq wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£. Wali amek tevoa d wid ippunedoen
Sinna, deffir es, Nuzen ed imazanen ar igduden nnsen. Usan ten id s ubeggen. Ur ssawven ad amnen $ef wayen nekoen zik. Akka ay Nselle$ ulawen ixabiten
Sinna, deffir sen, Nuzen ed Musa akked Haoun, ar Feraun akked imvebboen is, s issekniyen nne£. Sme$woen iman nnsen. Llan d agdud ibe$wviyen
Mi ten id tusa tidep, s$uone£, nnan: "wagi, ih, d sseur n uuee
Inna Musa: "day a tinim d sseur wagi, i tidep mi kwen id tusa"? Ur rebeen iseeearen
Nnan: "day d tusiv $uone$, ad a$ tesiixxoev seg wayen id nufa ar imezwura nne$, a ppu$alem, di sin, d imeqwoanen di tmurt? Ur numin, nekwni, yiswen
Inna Feraun: "awit iyi d yal aseeear amusnaw
Mi d usan iseeearen, inna yasen Musa: "veggoet ara tveggoem
Mi veggoen, inna Musa: "ayen d tebbwim d sseur. S tidep, a t Inqev Oebbi". Ih, Oebbi ur Issewqam ara igiten ifessaden
Oebbi Itebbit tidep, s wawal iS, xas ugin ibe$wviyen
I iumnen s Musa, siwa tarwa seg ugdud is, ilmend n tugdi uhewwel n Feraun akked imvebboen is. Ih, Feraun d abe$wvi di tmurt. Neppa, s tidep, seg imaafan
Inna Musa: "a yagdud iw! Ma teppamnem s Oebbi, ppeklet fellaS ma d imvuaen ay tellam
Nnan: "neppkel $ef Oebbi. A Mass nne$, ur a$ ppara d ahewwel i ugdud imednas
Sellek a$, s ueunu K, seg ugdud ijehliyen
Nweeea i Musa akked gma s: "ebnut ixxamen i ugdud nnwen di Maueo, erret ixxamen nnwen ar lqibla, beddet i teallit. Becceo lmumnin

Inna Musa: "a Mass nne$! S tidep, Tefkiv i Feraun akked imvebboen is, ooeue akked wayla di tmeddurt n ddunit, a Mass nne$, iwakken ad nnetlafen seg ubrid iK. A Mass nne$, Squcc ayla nnsen, S$eo ulawen nnsen, ur ppamnen alamma walan aaaqeb aqeoean
Inna: "ih, tepwaqbel tnaaoit nnwen. Ddut di lewqam, ur teddut d ubrid n wid ur nessin
Nezzger At Isoail di yill. Vefoen ten Feraun akked iasekoiwen is, s leb$wev d lewaaoa. Armi ibbwev ad i$meq, inna: "umne$! Ih, ur illi oebbi siwa Win is umnen At Isoail. Nek seg imvuaen
Tura! Ni$ zik taauav, telliv seg ifessaden
Assa, a Nsellek loeppa k, a d tegwri d assekni i wid ara k id ineufen. Aias n medden, s tidep, stehzan deg issekniyen nne£
Ni$ Nessers At Isoail deg umkan umain, u N$at iten s wayen ilhan. Ur mgaraden armi ten id tusa tussna. Ih, Mass ik ad Ieudd garasen, ass n tnekra, ilmend n wayen i$ef llan mgaraden
Ma tcukkev $ef wayen i k ed Nessers, steqsi wid i iqqaoen Tazmamt, uqbel ik. Ni$ tusa k id tidep, s$uo Mass ik, ur ppili seg wid ipcukkun
Ur ppili seg wid i iskaddben issekniyen n Oebbi, a ppiliv seg imexsuoen
Ih, wid i$ef iuao Wawal n Mass ik, ur ppamnen
xas usan ten id akw issekniyen, alamma walan aaaqeb aqeoean
A lemmer telli temdint iumnen, u infaa p liman is, siwa agdud n Yunes! Mi umnen, Nveooef segsen aaaqeb imdelli di tmeddurt n ddunit. Neooa ten zzhan tallit kan
Ma ihwa yaS i Mass ik, ad amnen wid illan di ddunit, akken ma llan. Day a peeppmev, kecc, i imdanen ad amnen
Ur ippamen umdan siwa ma Irad Oebbi. Isdullu wid ur nfehhem ara
Ini: "walit i illan di tmurt akked igenwan. Ula iwumi issekniyen akked ineddioen, i ugdud ur neppamen
Day a pganin kan amedya n wussan n wid i ten id izwaren? Ini: "gganit, nek yidwen, seg wid ipganin
Sinna, a Nsellek imazanen nne£, akked wid iumnen. Akka ay d lwajeb fella£, a Nsellek lmumnin
Ini: "a yimdanen! Ma tcukkem di ddin iw, nek ur aabde$ wid taabdem, war Oebbi. Maca, aabde$ Oebbi ara Idmen leowae nnwen. Pwamoe$ ad ili$ si lmumnin
Sbedd udem ik i ddin, s umili ar tidep, ur ppili seg imcurak
Ur pnuju, war Oebbi, ar wayen ur k inefaan, ur k iiiuooun. Ma txedmev akken, kecc, imiren, a ppiliv seg imednas
Ma Isaadda fellak Oebbi ccqa, ur ak illi ujebbao siwa Neppa. Ma Irad ak lxio, ur illi usebiiel i lfevl iS. Ippak it i win i S ihwan, deg ixdimen iS. Neppa Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Ini: "a yimdanen! Ni$ tusa kwen id tidep s$uo Mass nnwen! Win ipwanhan, ipwanha kan i iman is; win innetlafen, innetlef kan i iman is. Ur lli$, nek, d awkil nnwen
Ddu d wayen ik ed ippuweeean, eubeo ard Ieudd Oebbi. Neppa, Yif akw imeaddan
